Bio

Hello! My name is Kyle Young and I am starting my career as a Software Developer. I have been working 10+ years in customer service related jobs and figured it was time to switch career paths. I am a college graduate with a BA in Cinematography, a field I was incredibly passionate in when I was younger. I would soon pick up music after college and pursued this difficult field for some time. Along the way, I was asked to be apart of a group of talented and intelligent individuals who shared similar goals. The team I work with has created a business known as Elevated Common Ground (ECG for short), a business that has been throwing successful shows ever since. Although finding some success, I was not satisfied with developing one skill and turned to coding as a result.

2021 - 2022

Corinthian International

Health Screener

Scheduled and accompanied clients to medical appointments throughout the day. Organized client’s appointment information before and after the workshift, in preparation for the rest of the week. Assessed workplace locations to guarantee accommodations of clients with handicaps or disabilities.

2017 - 2018

Gen Korean BBQ

Lead Bartender

Proactively assess staff’s skills while providing insight and support if warranted. Teaching new-hire bartenders and preparing them for success in the workspace. Responsible for organizing and restocking the bar during work hours.
